skills.name: Farewell Hit
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to **50%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: RIP Home Run
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to **63%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Stardust Ace
skills.desc:
Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to **300%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.
Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to **180%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to **108%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Perfect Pickoff
skills.desc: Each time after this character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, ATK increases by **10%**. This effect stacks up to 2 time(s).

skills.name: Immortal Third Strike
skills.desc: Immediately heals all allies for 15% of their respective Max HP after using this Technique.

skills.name: Blowout: Farewell Hit
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to **300%** of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Blowout: RIP Home Run
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to **180%** of Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Physical DMG equal to **108%** of Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

eidolons.name: A Falling Star
eidolons.desc: When enemies are defeated due to the Trailblazer's Ultimate, the Trailblazer regenerates 10 extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per attack.

eidolons.name: An Unwilling Host
eidolons.desc: Attacking enemies with Physical Weakness restores the Trailblazer's HP equal to 5% of the Trailblazer's ATK.

eidolons.name: A Leading Whisper
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: A Destructing Glance
eidolons.desc: When attacking an enemy with Weakness Break, CRIT Rate is increased by 25%.

eidolons.name: A Surviving Hope
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: A Trailblazing Will
eidolons.desc: The Trailblazer's Talent is also triggered when they defeat an enemy.

skillTree.name: Ready for Battle
skillTree.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

skillTree.name: Perseverance
skillTree.desc: Each Talent stack increases the Trailblazer's DEF by 10%.

skillTree.name: Fighting Will
skillTree.desc: When using Skill or Ultimate "Blowout: RIP Home Run", DMG dealt to the target enemy is increased by 25%.
